name: Hunt: Showdown
summary: Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements. Set in the darkest corners of the world, Hunt packs the thrill of survival games into a match-based format.
info:
• 开发: Crytek
  • 发行: Crytek
  • 别名: 猎杀对决
  • 别名: Hunt: Horrors of the Gilded Age
  • 别名: Hunt Showdown
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: CryEngine V
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2018/02/22 (Early Access), 2019/08/27 (Full release)
  • 官方网站: https://www.huntshowdown.com/
